The address has changed! (Actually it changed ~May 2009, but we had 
smooth redirections in place until a machine was retired a few weeks 
ago, so many users of old URLs may not have even noticed.)

The new address:

https://webarchive.jira.com/browse/HER

I'll see about restoring a stub redirection service somewhere; was the 
link you followed from a personal record or some public place?

- Gordon @ IA
